fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
*Primordial Jade Cutter*
The insanely high CRIT Rate substat helps a lot with building physical jean, the low base attack is mitigated by the passive.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Aquila Favonia, The Black Sword, Prototype Rancour
